description: Rotary Engraver for the Department of National Defence (DND)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### About the Tender

* **Tender Title**: Rotary Engraver (W0501-23M010) ([Graveur Rotatif](https://translation-mt.army.ca/resource/graveur-rotatif))

* **Publication Date**: May 24, 2023

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2023 at 14:00 hours (ET Canada)
* **Tender Status**: [Cancelled](...)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: None

#### Contracting Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND), 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Petten, Genevieve (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
